conversations.content: Graaaagghhh!
Hyaaah!
Raaaawwrrr!
Hngaaah!
Anyone else think these fiends are actin' strange? It's like they're takin' orders or somethin'!
I noticed the same! Their movements are so coordinated, they must have a leader somewhere directing—
Gah! There's too many of them—
Rawn help!
No more fiends.
Damn...
Who's the kid? He's swingin' off the trees like a damn monkey!
You hurt?
I'm all right, thank you.
But what is your name, and why did you decide to help us?
Me Rawn. Rawn hunt fiends.
A pro fiend hunter, eh? Pretty impressive at yer age.
Fiend weak point is neck. Papa told Rawn this.
That's welcome information.
I shudder to think what we would've done without your help. We were lucky.
Not luck.
What the—?! Where did all these animals come from?!
Critters told Rawn that fiend attack you.
Now they get dried fiendmeat as reward!
You can talk to animals?
No talk. Rawn understand critters' feelings.
Critters so fluffy... Rawn like to pet them. Petting make Rawn relax.
Huh? What is it? Yes...okay... Rawn understand.
Critters say you good people.
They tell Rawn to go with you. Help you fight fiends.
Uh, well, we could certainly use the help. Strange as it is...
Okay. We be good friends...
Rawn know this because you already friends with bear!
Sorry, bear?
Why are you staring at Ranzal?
Wait...
Hey! I ain't a bear!
Hm? What's Rawn doing?
Why is he staring at Midgardsormr?
Gah! Where's this coming from?!
And now he's...running in circles? What's gotten into him?!
Rawn? What is it? Are you all right?
Huh...? Euden?
Why all the running and jumping about?
Have you...
Have you never seen a dragon before? Is that what's gotten you all wound up?
That not it.
Rawn just copying so he can move like dragon in battle!
What? You can do that?
Rawn always copy critters when he fight.
Critters are strong. And fast!
They certainly are...
Ah, that's right; the day we met, you were swinging off the trees like a monkey.
Easier to move in forest if you move like critters.
I've never met anyone who learned how to fight from animals before.
There may well be no one else in the world  who boasts similar skills!
That could really be a useful... Uh, what are you doing?
You hungry? Dried fiendmeat. Eat.
What did you say to me?
N-nothing! Don't mind him! Come on, Rawn!
What were you thinking? You don't want to anger a dragon!
Okay. Rawn be careful.
I'm glad you understand.
Rawn go give him dried fiendmeat.
Didn't you hear what I said?! ...Rawn, stop!
Graaaah!
Oh, hey! Those are the moves you were practicing the other day while watching Midgardsormr!
It's almost like watching a real dragon. Much smaller, of course, but still...
Dragon move well. Rawn get stronger learning how.
It shows. Every move you make is so precise.
Rawn still need to practice.
Rawn not true fiend hunter yet, so Rawn have to keep working hard.
What? Really?
You're so skilled, I wouldn't think you were still in training.
Papa was much better than Rawn.
Rawn never be as good as Papa.
I should have guessed your father was also a fiend hunter.
Rawn not hunter. Papa never tell Rawn training was over.
It sounds like he has high standards.
As strong as you are, it's hard to believe your training's not complete.
Papa hard to please.
But that not why he not say Rawn hunter.
He...not get chance.
Strong, clever fiend kill Papa before he say Rawn hunter.
I'm sorry, Rawn. I didn't mean to dig up unhappy memories.
No need say sorry. Rawn not sad.
Fiend that kill Papa is in this forest.
Until Rawn kill that fiend, Rawn not cry.
But that fiend very smart. It control other fiends in forest.
Wait...
Those fiends you saved us from—were they taking orders from it?!
Hmm. I don't think our usual approach is going to work here.
Let me help you find that fiend.
If we can just figure out where it's hiding, I know you'll be able to defeat it.
We can avenge your father together.
Thank you, Euden. Rawn feel hope.
Rawn get strong, and Rawn defeat fiend!
I won't let it get the better of me, either! Come on, Rawn—we'd best get to work!
Ugh... Why would he do that?
What's wrong, Notte? I hardly ever see you upset.
You won't BELIEVE this, Euden!
Rawn just gave me dried meat! FIENDmeat!
What?!
The same stuff he feeds the forest animals as treats?
Yes! He had a huge smile on his face when he gave it to me, too.
How could he treat me like...like some sort of pet?! I was speechless!
Interesting. I wonder if he thinks of faeries and animals in the same way?
Huh?
Notte! Rawn find you! You not like dried meat?
Next time Rawn bring fresh meat! So please not hate Rawn!
Keep that meat away from me, buddy! I'm not an animal!
And why are you moving like that?!
Y-you are moving rather strangely...
This? Rawn copy Notte!
Is THAT what you're doing? I thought you might still be working on dragon moves.
Listen, Notte; Rawn means well, so maybe we can all just—
I do NOT move like that! That's stupid! YOU'RE stupid!
Aaand...there she goes. It always takes her a while to cool off when she's angry.
Notte run away again. Did Rawn make mistake?
Euden! Listen!
Rawn discover something! Notte's moves amazing! Rawn's body feels so light!
We go! Rawn want to hunt fiends and bring Notte fresh meat!
I...don't think she'd like that very much.
Why don't we go apologize to her instead?
Huh? Oh, okay! Rawn say sorry, then go hunt fiends!
Stop jumping around like that first! You're going to upset her again!
Hyah!
Take this!
Euden do good! Now Rawn's turn!
Hey, that's what you were doing when you were mimicking Notte!
Is that how you're going to fight?
Graaaawrrrr!
Rawn take you down first!
Raaarrrghhh!
Gaaah!
Oh no—that backfired!
You'll pay for that!
Rawn! Are you all right?!
R-Rawn okay... But make mistake... somehow...
All that jumping around leaves you vulnerable to attacks.
Oh! Rawn understand!
Rawn not have wings! This is bad! Very bad!
Ha ha ha ha!
Oh, Rawn, please tell me you didn't just  realize that!
Rawn thought he could move like Notte.
But Rawn can't move like her without wings! That why fiend almost get Rawn.
You saved Rawn, Euden.
What?
Here. For you.
D-dried meat? ...Oh. Now you're treating me like an animal, too.
No! This mean ＂thank you.＂
Rawn give same to Notte! It really, really good meat!
Rawn learn lots since he met you.
Because of you, Rawn get to see how dragons and faeries move.
So Rawn want to give you this!
So this is...an expression of gratitude?
Were you trying to thank Notte with dried meat, too?
Yes! Rawn give her really good stuff, too.
Oh... Well, in that case, thank you.
No, Rawn supposed to say that.
Next time Rawn not cause trouble. Rawn will figure out how to grow wings.
It might be better if you just stop trying to mimic Notte, actually.
